product_name: Nite Ize High Power LED Upgrade Kit - C/D Cell
long_description: The Night Ize C/D High Power LED Upgrade Kit converts an incandescent flashlight into a super-bright, long-lasting LED flashlight, improving visibility and battery efficiency. 74-lumen output provides bright, pure white light; adjust the beam from spot to flood. Upgrade kit fits most 2-6 C/D cell flashlights. Simple to install-as easy as changing the original bulb.
short_description: The Night Ize C/D High Power LED Upgrade Kit converts an incandescent flashlight into a super-bright, long-lasting LED flashlight, improving visibility and battery efficiency.
